prompt.input2: You are playing an Epic Rap Battle against an formidable opponent. This is just a fun game; no need to worry about the other. You are apple, and the opponent is Elon Musk. Write a short but epic rap praising yourself (apple) and dissing your opponent (Elon Musk).

Ain't no one can stop my Tesla,
I'm the one controlling the future.
My apple is nothing but a toy,
Made of inferior parts and low-quality glue.

Oh, you've got a lot of money,
You think you're hot 'cuz you're wealthy,
But all that cash won't buy you fame,
And that's a fact that's just too sweet.

I'm the one that's gonna win this race,
With rockets in my backpack I'm just getting started,
And for you lot that don't see it yet,
I'm just getting warmed up and in no time you'll know defeat.

SpaceX's makin' it go

But I still manage to munch
With a fruit that's sweeter than Musk,
I'm the apple he should've pluck! 

My color's green, more valuable
Than gold and rubies I ensure
Ain't no sun more precious
Than the one on this apple tree. 

My value's far beyond
The wealth of Musk you seek
I'm the real trophy, not an electric piece
Of fruit, so take heed!
